mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, pwd, name, phone, email, address1, address2, address3) VALUES (#{userid}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3})
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, zip_num=#{zip_num}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2}, address3=#{address3} where userid=#{userid}
